Ayu#ShTa >1, AyuqrdA a#gnaq >2, A pyA#yasvaq >3, saM tE >4, &va# tEq hEDaq >5, udu#ttaqmaM >6, praNO# dEqvyA >7, nO# diqvO >8 , 
&gnA# viShNUq >9, agnA#viShNU >10,iqmaM mE# varuNaq >11,tattvA# yAq>12, myu duqtyam >13 , ciqtram >14 ||
aqpAM napAqdA hyasthA#duqpastha#M jiqhmAnA#mUqrdhvO viqdyutaqM ~MvasA#naH | 
tasyaq jyEShTha#M mahiqmAnaqM ~Mvaha#ntIq r.hira#NyavarNAqH pari# yanti yaqhvIH ||
